effect.short: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
effect.full: User faints.  Its replacement's HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

flavorTexts.text:
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its
place will have its status and HP fully restored.
